text:
#COVID19 is highly contagious, but we don’t know who has it until it’s too late.
 
Some don’t show symptoms at all. Others get seriously ill, but not until after they’ve been carrying it for 2 weeks.
 
The safest thing you can do is  limit your chances of exposure. Here's how ⤵️ https://t.co/wKOOwKQk46
